Assignments

Assignments: You will be given 4 problem sets to complete. Unless otherwise noted, these will be due at 5PM PDT on Fridays, submitted via Gradescope. If you do not see “STATS60 / Summer 2020” on your Gradescope account, you can self-enroll using the entry code 9EWEZR.

We provide the problem statement in a .pdf file. We also provide the .Rmd source file that was used to generate the assignment. Using the .Rmd file may turn out helpful for typesetting your answers, but is completely optional. Sometimes a data set is also included. To use it, you can right click it and select “Save as” and then save the file to a convenient location on your hard drive.

Assignment Files Due Date
HW 1 .pdf - .Rmd source - solutions.pdf - solutions.Rmd Friday July 3rd, 5pm PDT
Quiz 1 Solutions Wednesday July 15, 5PM PDT
Project Proposal See the Project page Wednesday July 15th, 5PM PDT
HW 2 .pdf - .Rmd source - Isotope data file - solutions.pdf - solutions.Rmd Friday July 17th, 5pm PDT
Mid-quarter Evaluation Online form Friday July 17th, 5PM PDT
Quiz 2 Solutions Wednesday July 29, 5PM PDT
HW 3 .pdf - .Rmd - Drought.csv data file - solutions.pdf - solutions.Rmd Friday July 31, 5PM PDT
Quiz 3 Solutions Wednesday August 5, 5PM PDT
HW 4 .pdf - .Rmd - data file - data file small - heart.png image (only needed to knit the .Rmd) - solutions.pdf - solutions.Rmd Saturday August 15, 6PM PDT
Quiz 4 On Gradescope Wednesday August 12, 5PM PDT
